name: claude-talk-to-figma-mcp (arinspunk)
description: [项目级] A Model Context Protocol (MCP) that allows Claude Desktop and other AI tools (Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, etc.) to read, analyze, and modify Figma designs。来源: https://github.com/arinspunk/claude-talk-to-figma-mcp
